hero.title: Creating modern web solutions for business
hero.subtitle: Development of interfaces in React/Next.js with responsive layout for mobile devices. Structured component organization with reusability and clear naming. Animation and section adjustments according to the provided design.

about.label: About me
about.title: Front-end development focused on intuitive interfaces and business goals. Websites and landing pages on React/Next.js with a well-thought-out structure, adaptability, and micro-animations that support the brand and do not overload the user.

craft.title: I am a frontend developer.
craft.description: I create web interfaces that combine aesthetics and functionality. I work with landing pages and small websites on React/Next.js, build component architecture, and think through adaptability, animations, and performance. It is important to me that the design is not only beautiful, but also understandable and convenient for people.
focusAreas: Development of landing pages and small websites on React/Next.js
Responsive layout, accessibility, and basic SEO optimization
Component structure with clear naming and reusability
Animations and micro-interactions that emphasize the brand rather than distract

stepsList.title: Analysis and strategy
stepsList.description: We start with a briefing: we agree on the goals, structure and visual style of the website and form a preliminary estimate of the budget and deadlines.

stepsList.title: Agreement on terms and conditions
stepsList.description: If necessary, we conclude a contract in which we clearly specify the scope of work, deadlines, cost and rules of cooperation.

stepsList.title: Project launch
stepsList.description: After confirming the terms, you make a 30% prepayment, I reserve the time and proceed with the project implementation.

stepsList.title: Website development
stepsList.description: I create and program websites, integrate your content, and check that everything works correctly on different devices and browsers.

stepsList.title: Launch and transfer
stepsList.description: I make final edits, publish the website, and provide access details and brief instructions on how to use it.

stepsList.title: Support and development
stepsList.description: Upon request, I provide further support: updates, minor changes, and optimisation for stable and efficient website operation.
